channel.title: WASI on Second State News and Articles
channel.description: Recent content in WASI on Second State News and Articles

item.title: Toward a more interoperable WebAssembly
item.description: Reference types and bulk memory operations support on Second State VM 0.7.0 The Second State VM (SSVM) is an open-source WebAssembly virtual machine implementation optimized for server-side applications. It is one of the fastest WebAssembly VM on the market today partly because of AOT (Ahead Of Time) compiler optimization. See our performance benchmark paper to be published on IEEE Software. It provides seamless integration into population web service frameworks, such as Node.
